LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_SharpDamageMultiplier.label: melee sharp damage multiplier
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_SharpDamageMultiplier.descri: Multiplier on melee damage with sharp attacks like cutting or stabbing.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_BluntDamageMultiplier.label: melee blunt damage multiplier
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_BluntDamageMultiplier.descri: Multiplier on melee damage with blunt attacks.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Agility.label: melee agility
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Agility.description: Multiplier on handling speed in melee combat.
